item.title: C64: Lost Signal
item.description: About A digital escape room experience set in the retro aesthetic of a Commodore 64 computer. Navigate through cryptographic puzzles, hidden messages, and retro computing challenges to uncover the lost signal. Play Here The Signal You haul a beige relic out of an abandoned office, dust in the vents, a coffee ring fossilized on its case. It's a Commodore 64, the once faithful terminal of a NASA communications researcher, late 1980s.
